title: What are some good cheap Windows laptops? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best cheap laptop deals in May 2019: prices start at just... Dell Inspiron 15 5000 15.6-inch touchscreen laptop | $499 at Walmart. ...Evoo 11.6-inch touchscreen laptop | $139 at Walmart. ...Lenovo Chromebook S330 | $159 at Walmart. ...Dell Inspiron 11 3000 11-inch laptop | $159 at B&H Photo. ...Asus Chromebook C423 | $244 at Newegg. ...Asus VivoBook Flip 2-in-1 laptop | $299.99 at Amazon.

There are many brads DELL, ACER, MSI, Lenovo and HP. But according to my experience and usage I found DELL, MSI, Acer and Lenovo are good laptops. HP has very poor customer support so I can’t recommend this. MSI is best laptop for high end gaming and edition. Heavy duty laptops are dealing by this brand. ACER : They have mixed varieties of laptops. Gaming/Professional , general and average duty laptops. I found they have good customer support in city as well as remote areas. Lenovo : Recent times it is fast growing in general categories. Good laptops in day to day life.
